items.sentence: A team is only as strong as its weakest member.
Tom spends about an hour a day studying French.
Tom stayed with me until the ambulance arrived.
Tom strung a clothesline between the two trees.
Be careful. I don\'t want you to hurt yourself.
Both Tom and I don\'t understand French at all.
Can you read what\'s written on the blackboard?
I can\'t imagine how I\'d feel in Tom\'s shoes.
They say that you never forget your first love.
I think you\'d look distinguished with a beard.
